text: Côte d'Ivoire (CIV) has been to all Summer Olympic Games held since 1964 except for 1980. No athletes from Côte d'Ivoire have been in any Winter Olympic Games. ==Medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event Gabriel Tiacoh 1984 Los Angeles Athletics Men's 400 metres ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * Côte d'Ivoire profile at London2012.com * Côte d'Ivoire at Olympic.org Category:Sport in Ivory Coast Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:National sports teams of Ivory Coast
title: Côte d'Ivoire at the Olympics
